data.weather: Total on Saturday 26mm up to midnight. 2mm so far on Sunday ealry hours. Raceday: odd squally shower, cloudy start then sunny breaks.
data.rail: Winning line out 13yds. Exeter bend: Hurdle out 6yds. Chase innermost true separate bend. Plymouth home-turn bend: Hurdle out by 4yds. Chase innermost true separate bend. Home straight hurdles in new, fresh positions out by 2 pads-width. Last hurdle back straight omitted.

data.weather: Partly Cloudy. Sat 15mm rain, dry from 10pm. Forecast: Sun dry, breezy, rain showers late afternoon.
data.other: A very Happy Christmas to you. Have a lovely festive time, safe travels and we all look forward to seeing you at Fakenham on NYD. Any questions please give me a call on 07767802206. David Hunter
data.rail: Wide strip of fresh ground whole way around the hurdle course. Fresh ground on bends on chase course.

data.going: Standard Track will be worked to 3 inches with cultivator to allow for any compaction due to rain. Gallop master finish
data.weather: 17mm in the last week including 7mm overnight. Remaining mainly dry and overcast with some sunny spells. Brisk SW wind. Temp approx 9C
data.other: Galloping available up to 2hr 30mins before racing on the Tapeta track. Contact David Attwood on 07860 274289 dattwood@southwell-racecourse.co.uk or Simon Davis 07787 521619 sdavis@southwell-racecourse.co.uk to book. £20 per gallop and £20 per stable if required. Passports required to be shown.

data.weather: 3mm of rain in the last 24hrs, 77mm of rain recorded since Tuesday. Chance of some light rain this morning, this will clear by 8.30am to leave a dry day with sunny spells, max temp 9C.
data.rail: Split bends in operation for this meeting. Top bend- Chase: 4yds from innermost line. Hurdle:10yds from innermost line. Bottom bend- Chase: On innermost line. Hurdle: 12yds from innermost line. All chase rail on the straights are back on the inner lines providing some fresh ground.
